description: Cognitive model for AI literacy - skills, mental models, and progression

mental_models.name: AI as Pattern Amplifier
mental_models.description: AI excels at recognizing and extending patterns in data
when_to_use: Tasks involving existing patterns (writing, analysis, design)
when_not_to_use: Tasks requiring genuine creativity or novel insight

mental_models.name: AI as Cognitive Mirror
mental_models.description: AI reflects and extends human thinking patterns
limitations: Limited to patterns in its training

novice.goal: Overcome initial intimidation, achieve first successes

proficient.goal: Strategic, creative, and critical AI use

note: This is a preliminary cognitive model. Will be expanded by Educational Psychologist agent.
